snippet: The Paul Taylor Dance Company announced that commitments from art sales had given it the money to remain afloat, now as Paul Taylor’s American Modern Dance.
abstract: Paul Taylor Dance Company announces that commitments of $10 million from art sales has given it the money to remain afloat; will reinvent itself in 2015 as Paul Taylor's American Modern Dance, center that will perform dances by Taylor, other modern dance pioneers and contemporary choreographers.
lead_paragraph: The Paul Taylor Dance Company announced that commitments from art sales had given it the money to remain afloat, now as Paul Taylor’s American Modern Dance.

headline.main: New Name and Mission for Taylor Dance Troupe
headline.print_headline: New Name and Mission for Taylor Dance Troupe
